Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Simulation

  • public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class runs the simulation between a Car and a Helicopter. it creates both vehicles with random attributes, simulates weather conditions, and runs the race while handling obstacles and buffs/debuffs.
    Version:
    Oct 26, 2025
    Author:
    Nick Stoyanov
